messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Report

Thanks to the tireless efforts of our security and intelligence divisions, there are currently no credible threats to Maconha Station 13. All station construction projects have been authorized. Have a secure shift!

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Okay, acho que a crew de voces vai gostar dessa.. uma almirante synth presa noum posto de pesquisa abandonado

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: gateway travada nas coordenadas, a transmissao menciona swarmers

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: centcom lembrando que o distress da almirante ainda ta ligado

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Maconha Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Unstable bluespace anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Head of Personnel's Office.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Mysterious Figure

A mysterious figure has been detected on sensors at Technical Storage

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: só pra lembrar que a essa hora a almirante ja morreu e os swarmers tomaram tudo

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: vao ver se sobro alguem vivo no outpost logo antes que o alto comando desisita da missao

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: alguem mata o cara e recalla a shuttle
